Q_DESC:
To write a menu driven program in which the user has to perform operations in doubly linked list (DELETION).
The MENU is supposeed to look like the below example:
1. Create List
2. Delete node - nth position
3. Display list
0. Exit
The user is supposed to use the exact numberings as shown above.
INPUT:
1 //create list(option 1 in menu)
3 //number of elements in the list
11 //element one
22 //eleement two
33 //element three
3 //display list(option 3 in menu)
2 //delete node nth position(option 2 in menu)
2 //position of node to be deleted
3 //display list(option 3 in menu)
0 //Exit(option 0 in menu) 
OUTPUT:

DATA IN THE LIST:
DATA of 1 node = 11
DATA of 2 node = 22
DATA of 3 node = 33


DATA IN THE LIST:
DATA of 1 node = 11
DATA of 2 node = 33
TESTCASE_1:
1 3 11 22 33 3 2 2 3 0
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
DATA IN THE LIST:
DATA of 1 node = 11
DATA of 2 node = 22
DATA of 3 node = 33


DATA IN THE LIST:
DATA of 1 node = 11
DATA of 2 node = 33

1 5 22 33 44 55 66 3 2 4 3 0

DATA of 3 node = 44
DATA of 4 node = 66
